pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato channassa upaṭṭhāko gahapati āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.4: Atha kho āyasmā channo vihāravatthuṃ sodhento aññataraṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagarapūjitaṃ jana­pada­pūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.6: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpessanti gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagarapūjitaṃ jana­pada­pūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.8: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.11: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpessati gāmapūjitaṃ … pe … raṭṭhapūjitan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.12: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ channaṃ aneka­pariyā­yena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.13: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, channa, cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṃ … pe … raṭṭhapūjitan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.16: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpessasi gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagarapūjitaṃ jana­pada­pūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.18: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.19: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.20: “Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.21: Tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.22: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kāreyya bhikkhū vā anabhineyya vatthudesanāya, saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.4: ullitto vā hoti avalitto vā ullittāvalitto vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.8: añño koci sāmiko hoti itthī vā puriso vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.12: tena vihārakārakena bhikkhunā vihāravatthuṃ sodhetvā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.13: “ahaṃ, bhante, mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.17: Sace sabbo saṃgho ussahati vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ sabbena saṃghena oloketabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.18: No ce sabbo saṃgho ussahati vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.19: ye tattha honti bhikkhū byattā paṭibalā sārambhaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ aparikkamanaṃ jānituṃ te yācitvā sammannitabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.23: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.25: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū sammanneyya itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.28: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.30: Saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū sammannati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.31: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhūnaṃ sammuti itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.33: Sammatā saṃghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.36: Tehi sammatehi bhikkhūhi tattha gantvā vihāravatthu oloketabbaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.40: Sace anārambhaṃ hoti saparikkamanaṃ, saṃghassa ārocetabbaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.42: Tena vihārakārakena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.43: “ahaṃ, bhante, mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.49: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.51: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ deseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.54: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.57: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāra­vatthussa desanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.63: kipillikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, upacikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, undūrānaṃ vā … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.74: yesaṃ kesañci tiracchā­na­gatā­naṃ pāṇānaṃ āsayo hoti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.75: pubbaṇ­ṇa­nissitaṃ vā hoti, aparaṇ­ṇa­nissitaṃ vā hoti, abbhā­ghāta­nissitaṃ vā hoti, āghāta­na­nissitaṃ vā hoti, susānanissitaṃ vā hoti, uyyānanissitaṃ vā hoti, rāja­vatthu­nissitaṃ vā hoti, hatthi­sālā­nissitaṃ vā hoti, assasā­lā­nissitaṃ vā hoti, bandha­nā­gāra­nissitaṃ vā hoti, pānāgā­ra­nissitaṃ vā hoti, sūnanissitaṃ vā hoti, racchānissitaṃ vā hoti, cac­cara­nissitaṃ vā hoti, sabhānissitaṃ vā hoti, ­saṃsa­ra­ṇa­nissitaṃ vā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.78: na sakkā hoti yathāyuttena sakaṭena anuparigantuṃ, samantā nisseṇiyā anuparigantuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.81: na kipillikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.85: sakkā hoti yathāyuttena sakaṭena anuparigantuṃ, samantā nisseṇiyā anuparigantuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.90: ullitto vā hoti avalitto vā ullittāvalitto vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.94: ñattidutiyena kammena vihāravatthuṃ na desāpetvā karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.1: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.2: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.3: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.4: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.5: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti desita­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.6: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti desita­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.7: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti desita­vatthu­kaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.1.8: Bhikkhu vihāraṃ karoti desita­vatthu­kaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.2.3: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.2.4: sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.2.5: anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.2.9: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti desita­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.3.4: “desitavatthuko ca hotu anārambho ca saparikkamano cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.3.5: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.3.6: sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.3.7: anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.3.12: “desitavatthuko ca hotu anārambho ca saparikkamano cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.3.13: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti desita­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.4: “desitavatthuko ca hotu anārambho ca saparikkamano cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.5: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.6: So suṇāti—“vihāro kira me kayirati adesi­ta­vatthuko sārambho aparikkamano”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.7: Tena bhikkhunā sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ dūto vā pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.8: “desitavatthuko ca hotu anārambho ca saparikkamano cā”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.12: No ce sāmaṃ vā gaccheyya dūtaṃ vā pahiṇeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.16: “desitavatthuko ca hotu anārambho ca saparikkamano cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.17: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti desita­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.18: So suṇāti—“vihāro kira me kayirati desitavatthuko sārambho aparikkamano”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.4.19: Tena bhikkhunā sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ dūto vā pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.4: “desitavatthuko ca hotu anārambho ca saparikkamano cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.5: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.6: sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.7: anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.12: “desitavatthuko ca hotu anārambho ca saparikkamano cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.13: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti desita­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.14: sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.5.15: anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.3: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti adesi­ta­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.4: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā so vihāro aññassa vā dātabbo bhinditvā vā puna kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.5: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.6: sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.7: anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.11: Tassa vihāraṃ karonti desita­vatthu­kaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.12: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā so vihāro aññassa vā dātabbo bhinditvā vā puna kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.6.13: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.7.1: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.7.2: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.7.3: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:3.7.4: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
